  <li>Strip-plot Designs</li>
  </ul>

  <!-- Scripts -->
  <script>
  // FAQ expand/collapse
document.querySelectorAll('.faq-item').forEach(function(item) {
  item.addEventListener('click', function() {
    this.classList.toggle('open');
  });
  item.tabIndex = 0;
  item.addEventListener('keypress', function(e) {
    if (e.key === "Enter") {
      this.classList.toggle('open');
    }
  });
});

// Schedule calendar popup
const modal = document.getElementById("popupModal");
const closeBtn = document.querySelector(".close-btn");
document.querySelectorAll(".cal-cell.active").forEach(cell => {
  cell.addEventListener("click", () => {
    document.getElementById("popup-day").textContent = cell.dataset.day;
    document.getElementById("popup-topic").textContent = cell.dataset.topic;
    document.getElementById("popup-trainer").textContent = cell.dataset.trainer;
    modal.style.display = "flex";
  });
});
closeBtn.onclick = () => modal.style.display = "none";
window.onclick = (e) => {
  if (e.target == modal) modal.style.display = "none";
};

// Initial popup handling
const initialPopup = document.getElementById("initialPopup");
const mainContent = document.getElementById("mainContent");
const closePopup = document.getElementById("closePopup");

// Show popup and blur content on load
window.onload = () => {
  initialPopup.style.display = "flex";
  mainContent.classList.add("blurred");
};

// Close popup and remove blur
closePopup.onclick = () => {
  initialPopup.style.display = "none";
  mainContent.classList.remove("blurred");
};
window.onclick = (e) => {
  if (e.target == initialPopup) {
    initialPopup.style.display = "none";
    mainContent.classList.remove("blurred");
  }
};
</script>
